ygData.subject: Help, please!
ygData.msgSnippet: hi there!  I was wondering if ANYONE could help me out.  I had everquest a LONG time ago (it s such a GREAT game) but then my mom threw it out, basically.  I
ygData.messageBody:
hi there! I was wondering if ANYONE could help me out. I had
everquest a LONG time ago (it's such a GREAT game) but then my mom
threw it out, basically. I haven't had it for a few years now but I
bought the "Everquest Trilogy" just a few weeks out. Now i'm having
some problems and I just don't understand...

I have all the requirements for the game, including DirectX 8.1. BUT,
the game WON'T start! It keeps saying "3D not available." Can
ANYONE help me out? We have 3D, directX 8.1, the requirements...
But it won't work... anyone have any ideas at all? I really don't
want to return this game... I would luv yah if you'd help me! Thanks!

Hugs and Kisses,
Wish
